articles.author: Emily Price
articles.title: Tesla Recalls Almost Every Vehicle Ever Sold in the US - PCMag UK
articles.description: The 'recall,' which is being fixed now via an over-the-air update, addresses a problem with hard-to-read warning lights. It's also the first recall to impact Tesla's new Cybertruck.
articles.content: Tesla has issued a new recall that impacts almost every vehicle its ever sold in the United States. The recall, over hard-to-read warning lights, impacts over 2 million vehicles, including the compan… [+1643 chars]
